phrases: yume kanaeru made chousen wa tsuzuku
juunengo no mirai kagayaiteru sugata wa
koukai wa shinai jibun de egaita story
makenai to i am about to mune ni chikatta
yume no tochuu de meguriau deai to wakare
kimi ga oshietekureta boku dake ga motsu chikara
Well, it is a ripoff, so it is no good.
This is one I thought of based on Tanto's hairdo.
I do not know about that...
You have not fixed the areas I pointed out.
Please let me know if something is bothering you.
If it is something I can help with, I will.
Am I appealing as a woman?
Er, what do you mean by that?
Do you see me as an attractive woman?
I said something like, Boys your age would surely find you attractive.
You should take advantage of that to make her write better!
I cannot use a 19 year old girl's feelings like that.
I could understand if it was Niizuma, though.
Those two do not suit each other at all!
Speaking of Niizuma, he said he is not reading Tanto.
I do not know about that.
It means something when you catch yourself doing it, right?
I do not know about that.
Okay, let us try putting it in several times per week.
it is definitely not a good rank.
Thinking up the gags took a lot of time this week,
so I did not have time for the storyboard...
Well, you can turn it in by Monday at the latest.
But you have always had it by Friday.
I will definitely have it by tomorrow.
Hattori told me to tell you something.
Natural is already being fought over by the TV stations.
and even offers for a live-action film, it seems.
It is not even at the 10th chapter yet.
And... it seems like Niizuma's not reading Tanto anymore.
Eiji, who said he was a fan of Ashirogi...
So the fans think Tanto is no good?
Does this mean that we will be finishing on Monday from now on?
Um, I think that is how it will go for a while.
Do you still need weekends off?
When a manuscript comes in, look over the whole thing first.
Are you not sleeping tonight, either?
I do not know about two all nighters in a row...
I do not know about that...
Our rank is not going up.
Ever since we added I do not know in the 10th chapter, we have been at 12th place or worse.
W-Well, you just put it in.
Something like this will only show results if you are persistent!
Saiko, how long can you wait for the storyboard?
I have some breathing room from the double issue,
but I would say no more than a week.
Then it might be two to three days later than usual.
Fine, but would not you have to put off the vacation we planned for your wedding ceremony in June?
If you do not leave yourself enough time...
My livelihood is depending on it, so I have to work hard.
Sorry, but I am leaving early.
Yes, MiyoshiI mean, Miss Takagi Kaya?
Akito just called and said he was coming home now...
He is been working all night for three days now.
You were hospitalized before, so I am worried about him.
I will tell him not to push himself too hard.
It seems that Niizuma does not read Tanto anymore.
Is he planning on going without sleep until our wedding in two days?
I wanted to talk to you one more time before your vacation.
It is hardly a vacation; only three days and two nights at a hot spring.
In elementary school, you said you would never get married!
Akito, Kaya, congratulations on your marriage!
I clearly and fondly remember when Akito and Mashiro Moritaka came to me for a consultation.
It is been 5 years since then, and they have produced one wonderful work after another...
So why is not Akina here?
Next, they aimed for the Tezuka Prize with A Hundred Millionth.
Then they debuted in NEXT with Money and Intelligence,
and finally got their first serialization in Jack, Detective TRAP.
From reading these works, I know these two have talent.
One day, they will become famous manga authors who will support Shounen Jack.
Akito is a lucky man to have a wife like Kaya and a partner like Moritaka Mashiro.
He did not say anything about Tanto.
I can only think they are disappointed in us.
Akito, Kaya... th-thank yoer, I mean, congratulations!
Are not you really thinking that Tanto does not suit us, and that we should quit?
If you do, it will cause a fuss.
You know what it means to be a new author with two series that have been canceled quickly, right?
It will not go over well with Miura, either.
I do not even think Takagi will take it well.
Furthermore, Ashirogi is already labeled as a troublemaker.
If you do something that selfish, your contract may even be cut
If you insist on having this conversation, let us take it outside.
From his grim expression, something must be up.
The groom must not leave his seat.
You are not our editor, so you will not give us your opinion directly.
Are the rules of the editing department that strict?
If you have something to say, just tell me directly!
Are you going to do whatever I tell you?
You and Takagi just have to follow the path you chose and believed in!
That is what you have always done, right?
How far are you going to go to avoid saying what you think about Tanto?
You could at least give me some advice!
Just tell me whether you think it is good or not
Personally, I do not think it is good.
Ever since I saw your manuscript five years ago, I have believed that you can surpass Niizuma Eiji!
Let us get back to the ceremony.
It is close, but I am glad we chose Kinugawa.
I wonder what that was all about when Saiko and Hattori left the ceremony together.
When I ask Saiko, he kept saying
Anyway, let us enjoy our honeymoon!
This may be a bit abrupt, but do you read manga?
Yes, I read a lot of it.
One Piece, Naruto, Inumaru Dashi, and CROW!
Our guest today is the creator of CROW
with an successful anime to boot,
We would like to ask you what goes on behind the scenes of manga production.
Is not it difficult to work on two simultaneous weekly serializations?
Aside from sleeping, eating, and going to the bathroom, I am drawing.
I am happiest when drawing manga.
Now then, we have drawn up what a weekly schedule looks like for Niizuma!
Not just his work, but he himself is popular!
But still, are not there times when you just want to toss aside your manuscript and have fun?
Is there a weak part of yourself that you are fighting against?
Like, you are your own worst enemy?
They are the manga authors I like most, and my rivals.
What kind of music do you like?
You want to quit it because of the promise you made me?
Of course I want to fulfill the promise I made to you.
But right now, I want to quit...
because I want to aim higher!
I want to compete with Niizuma Eiji!
He does not read Tanto anymore.
Even though he said that, he just clearly stated that we are his rivals!
I also think you should quit.
If a person you think of as your rival will go that far for you, then you should quit.
I mean, is not it frustrating?
I cannot tell this to Shujin.
He is married and has to support his family.
I cannot say Let us quit!
that if it were me, I would quit.
And if we were married and you said you wanted to quit, I would agree without a second thought.
I will talk to Shujin when he gets back from his vacation.
I want to thank you, too, Mashiro.
We said we would talk to each other about anything...
Try your best, and cheer up!
Niizuma can speak better than I expected.
He might be in demand for variety shows.
Two serializations and public appearances, huh?
Well, there is no point in comparing them,
but yesterday, I got a phone call from Nakai's mother.
The guy who went back home to the country?
She thanked me again and again for looking after her son.
He only got one serialization, after all.
It is all good if it sells, but we cannot take responsibility if it does not.
We are in positions that control the direction of people's lives.
We should always keep that in mind.
It is true that our ratings have not gone up,
but we do not have to quit...
Before that, we should work on improving it.
I know you want to keep going.
I also think we cannot surpass Eiji with Tanto.
I felt pathetic when I heard him declare that we were his rivals.
That was the final blow for me.
Hearing from Hattori that we could surpass Eiji did not help, either.
Actually, you were the one who said it first.
Kaya said that you and I make the decisions about work.
I definitely did not want to lose to Iwase when Tanto was serialized,
but now losing is just a normal occurrence.
But I do not think they will let us quit just like that.
If the author really wants to quit, they have to let us, right?
But we really feel like there is no future in this.
I am at my limit for adding humor.
If the author wants to quit, will they let us?
I should take this to the higher ups...
You wanted to be able to draw in the hospital, and now you want to quit?
There is a limit to selfishness!
You will have to put in some work to get the ratings up,
but it is not in danger of being canceled.
The question is how to get it higher.
They say they are at their limit for jokes.
A manga was canceled so that Tanto could get in.
You should have more pride in your work.
May I ask the Chief Editor for his opinion, as well?
Then I will go get scolded.
I would like to quit the serialization of Tanto.
If you want to quit, then quit.
I have no need for authors who throw aside their work in the middle of a serialization.
You will not draw for Jack anymore.
If you are prepared for that, then you may quit.
Were you not prepared for that?
Should we stay fixated on Jack and keep going... or quit?
Of course you will keep going!
I want to beat Niizuma Eiji and Akina Aiko in Jack, at the very least.
I also want to win against Niizuma Eiji.
But I cannot do that with Tanto.
Is this talk about Niizuma coming from his declaration of you as his rivals on TV?
Do you think you can win against him if you quit Tanto and write another work?
It is not that I think we can win,
it is that I want to win!
Chief Editor, this is my fault!
Since they debuted, I have kept saying that Ashirogi Muto can overcome Eiji,
and again, recently, at Takagi's wedding...
Ashirogi Muto can overcome Niizuma Eiji?
It seems there is a problem within the editing department.
Takagi, do you think that you can surpass Niizuma Eiji with a work other than Tanto?
I do not think it is possible.
I believe they have the talent to do so,
but they have not been able to utilize it yet.
Of course, I believe they can as well.
If they do not go mainstream.
So please let us end Tanto!
The contract is for the full year, right?
How many more serialization committees are there?
Three more: the beginning of August, the middle of October, and the end of December.
then Mashiro and I will definitely submit something to one of those committees
that can compete with Niizuma Eiji!
If we cannot, then you can end our contract!
We will not draw for Jack anymore!
that saying you are not being allowed draw what you like is admitting that you have no talent.
Then we will submit something to one of those three committees
that the entire editorial department can approve of!
Is that fine with you, Mashiro?
But it is not something that falls under my responsibility.
But... they raised the bar too high for themselves.
might not be able to draw for Jack any more.
We need to make our next work
something that can compete with Niizuma Eiji!
How about a cute female protagonist who marries a manga author?
Sometimes detours and byways become the path to your dream!

kimi ga oshietekureta boku dake ga motsu chikara
The fight does not end until I fulfill my dream
I wonder how far I have come now?
In ten years, I will be living the dream
It is the scenario I wrote for myself, so I will have no regrets
But life is not that easy, and it is full of obstacles
Still, I swear to myself that I will not ever back down
I have a dream that I absolutely want to achieve
So I fuel my passion until I succeed
There will be meetings and partings along the way
But I will simply believe in my strength that you have taught me
And rise back up again and again and again

subete no sen wa kimi ni tsuzuku kakehashi sa
The reason I chose to take a detour
was to fall ever deeper in love with you
I have a feeling I have always known
what your voice sounds like when it calls my name
many lines that make up a suspension bridge leading to you
Show me the way I am sure our path
your way connects us without any turns
Show me the way It leads to the place where we promised
Show me the way I will never give up
Show me the way and see that we are certain to meet again
Yeah, she is not a very cute elementary schooler
But I guess taking them overseas from a young age is spoiling them.
If you wait, we will definitely take you to Hawaii
They will take me to Hawaii!
